item.title: Beyond Euclidean: Dual-Space Representation Learning for Weakly Supervised Video Violence Detection
item.description: Beyond Euclidean spaces, Dual-Space Representation Learning (DSRL) enhances weakly supervised video violence detection by cleverly integrating Euclidean and hyperbolic geometries for superior discrimi…
